Posts.Content:
Hi Palisadesmom. I was diagnosed with stage 4 breast cancer a year and a half ago. I'm 49 years old now and I take 20 mg of Tamoxifen daily. It's all about
 the hormones. Tamoxifen is an estrogen antagonist. It can absolutely effect how you feel. Wishing you the best.
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen and severe public speaking anxiety?
